mapper.insert: insert into t_question ( questioncode, title, context, tags, createtime, updatetime, usercode, viewcount, likecount, commentcount ) values ( #{questionCode}, #{title}, #{context}, #{tags}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{userCode}, #{viewCount}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount} );
mapper.select:
select *from t_question q,t_user u where q.usercode = u.usercode
and title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
order by questioncode desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_comment( commentcode, parentcode, parenttype, usercode, createtime, updatetime, likecount, context, commentcount ) values ( #{commentCode}, #{parentCode}, #{parentType}, #{userCode}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{likeCount}, #{context}, #{commentCount} )
mapper.select: select *from t_comment c,t_user u where c.parentcode = #{questionCode} and parenttype = 1 and c.usercode = u.usercode order by createtime desc
select *from t_comment c,t_user u where c.parentcode = #{parentCode} and parenttype = 2 and c.usercode = u.usercode order by createtime desc
mapper.update: update t_comment set commentcount = commentcount +1 where commentcode = #{parentCode} and parenttype = 1
